title: Strengthening Hospitality Practical Competencies: Competency-Based Medical Education Assessment Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more core components of a competency-based assessment framework.
Learners can draft a preliminary design by applying a five-step process for developing behavioral observation assessment tools.
Learners can develop and share two or more formative assessment strategies applicable in smartphone environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
